body: The ideal candidate should have good experience with regards to developing test plans, executing test cases, managing defects, working with development and business analysts in resolving issues and testing systems from an End-End perspective regarding backend server testing.REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS AND EXPERIENCEBachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent experienceKnowledge in testing systems from an End-End perspective regarding backend server testingFluent in oral and written English (especially technical terms )Able to operate independently and in a team, and establish effective working relationshipsPRINCIPLE JOB RESPONSIBILITIESThe test work primarily consists of testing the application from both a frontend and backend perspective. The tester may use a PC, tablet or Smartphone (browser, IOS, Android and windows phone) to help test the application focusing on both user operations and from an End to End perspective.The testing involves testing mobile application on various platforms, testing APIs, reviewing requirement documents in order to test the functionality of the software.
title: IT APPLICATION TESTER
